description.value:
You've always had a tail, but with practice, you've learned to use it for more than signaling your mood.

You can perform simple @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Interact] actions with your tail such as opening an unlocked door. Your tail can't perform actions that require fingers or significant manual dexterity, including any action that would require a check to accomplish, and you can't use it to hold items.
